facets.name: antimage_magebanes_mirror
facets.title: Magebane's Mirror
facets.description: Spells countered by Counterspell or Counterspell Ally will immediately burn a percentage of its mana cost from the enemy and deal damage based on the burned mana cost.

facets.name: antimage_mana_thirst
facets.title: Mana Thirst
facets.description: Anti-Mage gains damage when his enemies are at low mana.

facets.name: axe_one_man_army
facets.title: One Man Army
facets.description: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.

facets.name: axe_call_out
facets.title: Call Out
facets.description: Berserker's Call gives attacking enemies more attack speed and Axe more armor for the duration.

facets.name: bane_dream_stalker
facets.title: Dream Stalker
facets.description: Bane has increased attack speed when attacking Nightmared units.

facets.name: bane_sleepwalk
facets.title: Sleepwalk
facets.description: Nightmared units walk in Bane's chosen direction.

facets.name: bloodseeker_arterial_spray
facets.title: Arterial Spray
facets.description: Ruptured units are pushed when attacked by Bloodseeker.

facets.name: bloodseeker_bloodrush
facets.title: Bloodrush
facets.description: Bloodseeker can supercharge the movement speed from Thirst temporarily.

facets.name: bloodseeker_old_blood
facets.title: Old Blood
facets.description: Bloodrage silences the target and can be applied to enemies. Bloodrage increases base attack damage instead of spell damage.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_frozen_expanse
facets.title: Frozen Expanse
facets.description: Freezing Field also passively increases Crystal Maiden's cast range and area of effect.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_cold_comfort
facets.title: Cold Comfort
facets.description: Crystal Maiden restores her allies' Mana when casting spells. Increases innate Mana Regen Amplification.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_glacial_guard
facets.title: Glacial Guard
facets.description: Crystal Nova has increased radius and grants allied heroes a physical damage barrier. Barrier is increased for Crystal Maiden.

facets.name: crystal_maiden_arcane_overflow
facets.title: Arcane Overflow
facets.description: Activating Arcane Aura temporarily increases Crystal Maiden's spell amplification and mana costs. During the duration, Crystal Maiden restores her and her allies' Mana when casting spells.

facets.name: drow_ranger_high_ground
facets.title: Vantage Point
facets.description: Drow deals 30% more damage when attacking from high ground.

facets.name: drow_ranger_sidestep
facets.title: Sidestep
facets.description: Drow can move slowly and use items while casting Multishot.

facets.name: earthshaker_tectonic_buildup
facets.title: Tectonic Buildup
facets.description: Aftershock radius is increased by 40 for every level of Echo Slam.

facets.name: earthshaker_slugger
facets.title: Slugger Facet
facets.description: Enemies killed with Enchant Totem or Earthshaker's other abilities are sent flying, dealing damage to enemies they hit.

facets.name: earthshaker_reverberating_ridge
facets.title: Resonating Ridge
facets.description: Enemy heroes stunned by Fissure emit an echo to each nearby unit.

facets.name: juggernaut_bladestorm
facets.title: Bladestorm
facets.description: Blade Fury can now critically strike based on the level of Blade Dance.

facets.name: juggernaut_agigain
facets.title: Bladeform
facets.description: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.

facets.name: mirana_moonlight
facets.title: Moonlight Shadow Facet
facets.description: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies invisiblity and movement speed.

facets.name: mirana_sunlight
facets.title: Solar Flare
facets.description: Mirana's Ultimate grants allies increasing attack speed and damage over time.

facets.name: mirana_starstruck
facets.title: Starstruck
facets.description: Starstorm's second meteor deals more damage and blinds the target.

facets.name: mirana_leaps_and_bounds
facets.title: Leaps and Bounds
facets.description: Upon landing, Leap roots targets in a 250 radius for 1.5 =1.75 =2.0 =2.25s.

facets.name: nevermore_lasting_presence
facets.title: Lasting Presence
facets.description: Presence of the Dark Lord temporarily reduces more armor after nearby enemy heroes are killed. Every hero kill increases Necromastery's max souls by 1 until Shadow Fiend dies.

facets.name: nevermore_shadowmire
facets.title: Shadowmire
facets.description: Shadowraze slows enemies.

facets.name: morphling_agi
facets.title: Ebb
facets.description: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Agility. Waveform attacks enemies in his path.

facets.name: morphling_str
facets.title: Flow
facets.description: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now Strength. Adaptive Strike stuns based on Morphling's strength. Morphling gains 1% Spell Amp per 4 Agility.

facets.name: phantom_lancer_convergence
facets.title: Convergence
facets.description: Doppelganger spawns additional illusions, with the amount depending on Phantom Lancer's current health.

facets.name: phantom_lancer_divergence
facets.title: Divergence
facets.description: Juxtapose Illusions spawn on random nearby units and deal more damage but can't be controlled.

facets.name: phantom_lancer_lancelot
facets.title: Lancelot
facets.description: Spirit Lances from Phantom Lancer's illusions deal 25% Lance Damage.

facets.name: puck_jostling_rift
facets.title: Jostling Rift
facets.description: Waning Rift can push or pull targets.

facets.name: puck_curveball
facets.title: Curveball
facets.description: Puck's Illusory Orb can be curved in any direction, moves faster, deals more damage and lasts longer.

facets.name: pudge_fresh_meat
facets.title: Fresh Meat
facets.description: Dismember increases Strength when dealing damage to heroes.

facets.name: pudge_flayers_hook
facets.title: Flayer's Hook
facets.description: Meat Hook deals bonus damage based on the distance pulled, but base damage is reduced.

facets.name: pudge_rotten_core
facets.title: Rotten Core
facets.description: While Rot is activated, Pudge gains bonus attack damage every second.

facets.name: razor_thunderhead
facets.title: Thunderhead
facets.description: Storm Surge lightning strikes more often and hits all units within Eye of the Storm's area of effect when it is active.

facets.name: razor_spellamp
facets.title: Dynamo
facets.description: Razor gains 1.25% spell amplification for every 20 points of attack damage.

facets.name: sand_king_sandshroud
facets.title: Sandshroud
facets.description: Sand Storm has increased radius and grants Sand King Invisibility while in it.

facets.name: sand_king_dust_devil
facets.title: Dust Devil
facets.description: Sand Storm follows Sand King when he moves.

facets.name: sand_king_obscurity
facets.title: Sandblast
facets.description: When Sand King attacks enemies in Sand Storm, he applies a blinding debuff to his target.

facets.name: sand_king_pinpoint
facets.title: Final Sting
facets.description: A Caustic Finale explosion is created around every enemy hero hit in Stinger's innermost radius.

facets.name: storm_spirit_shock_collar
facets.title: Shock Collar
facets.description: Electric Vortex applies a debuff that triggers an Overload Charge if they attack.

facets.name: storm_spirit_static_slide
facets.title: Static Slide
facets.description: Static Remnants spawn at Storm Spirit and move to the target position.

facets.name: sven_heavy_plate
facets.title: Heavy Plate
facets.description: Warcry provides a physical damage barrier.

facets.name: sven_strscaling
facets.title: Wrath of God
facets.description: Sven gains additional attack damage from Strength.

facets.name: tiny_crash_landing
facets.title: Crash Landing
facets.description: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss destination.

facets.name: tiny_insurmountable
facets.title: Insurmountable
facets.description: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength. Slow Resistance also reduces the impact of Attack Speed slows.

facets.name: vengefulspirit_avenging_missile
facets.title: Avenging Missile
facets.description: Magic Missile deals 0.75 bonus damage for every creep the enemy has killed.

facets.name: vvengefulspirit_melee
facets.title: Soul Strike
facets.description: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.

facets.name: windrunner_focusfire
facets.title: Focus Fire Facet
facets.description: Focus Fire rapidly attacks a single target.

facets.name: windrunner_whirlwind
facets.title: Whirlwind
facets.description: Focus Fire randomly attacks enemies within range.

facets.name: windrunner_tangled
facets.title: Tangled
facets.description: Shackleshot affects more enemies and grants damage per unit shackled.

facets.name: windrunner_killshot
facets.title: Killshot
facets.description: Powershot executes low health enemy heroes.

facets.name: zuus_livewire
facets.title: Livewire
facets.description: Static Field deals more damage to nearby enemies.

facets.name: zuus_divine_rampage
facets.title: Divine Rampage
facets.description: When Thundergod's Wrath kills an enemy, it deals more damage to the other enemies.

facets.name: kunkka_high_tide
facets.title: High Tide
facets.description: Tidebringer cooldown is reduced per enemy hero it hits.

facets.name: kunkka_grog
facets.title: Grog Blossom
facets.description: When X Marks the Spot returns its target, Kunkka and all nearby allies gain Ghostship's Admiral's Rum buff.

facets.name: lina_supercharge
facets.title: Thermal Runaway
facets.description: Casting Laguna Blade temporarily supercharges Lina, granting her stacks of Fiery Soul.

facets.name: lina_dot
facets.title: Slow Burn
facets.description: Lina's spells deal extra damage over time.

facets.name: lich_frostbound
facets.title: Frostbound
facets.description: Chain Frost lingers on its last target if it fails to bounce and can bounce again if new targets become available.

facets.name: lich_growing_cold
facets.title: Growing Cold
facets.description: When an enemy is killed by Chain Frost or while under the effect of Frost Shield, the duration of these abilities is extended.

facets.name: lich_cryophobia
facets.title: Evil Eye
facets.description: Sinister Gaze applies a lingering effect to the target, causing it to take extra magic damage from Lich and amplify incoming movement slows.

facets.name: lion_essence_eater
facets.title: Essence Eater
facets.description: Mana Drain deals damage equal to 100% of mana stolen.

facets.name: lion_fist_of_death
facets.title: Fist of Death
facets.description: Lion gains a strong Melee cleaving attack after casting Finger of Death.

facets.name: shadow_shaman_cluster_cluck
facets.title: Cluster Cluck
facets.description: Hex can turn allies into a flock of chickens, removing other negative effects.

facets.name: shadow_shaman_voodoo_hands
facets.title: Chicken Fingers
facets.description: Shadow Shaman's attacks can transform enemies into a chicken.

facets.name: shadow_shaman_massive_serpent_ward
facets.title: Massive Serpent Ward
facets.description: Summons a single massive Serpent Ward with 12x damage and 10x health and bounty values.

facets.name: slardar_leg_day
facets.title: Leg Day
facets.description: Slardar has slow resistance and even more movement speed at the beginning of Guardian Sprint.

facets.name: slardar_brineguard
facets.title: Brineguard
facets.description: Corrosive Haze increases Slardar's armor by 50% of the total armor reduced.

facets.name: tidehunter_kraken_swell
facets.title: Kraken Swell
facets.description: Kraken Shell gains permanent Damage Block when an enemy hero dies under the effects of Anchor Smash.

facets.name: tidehunter_sizescale
facets.title: Krill Eater
facets.description: Tidehunter grows larger and gains extra bonuses per level.

facets.name: witch_doctor_headhunter
facets.title: Headhunter
facets.description: Paralyzing Cask deals more damage each bounce.

facets.name: witch_doctor_voodoo_festeration
facets.title: Voodoo Festeration
facets.description: Voodoo Restoration deals damage to enemies and only heals Witch Doctor.

facets.name: witch_doctor_cleft_death
facets.title: Cleft Death
facets.description: Death Ward attacks multiple targets with reduced damage.

facets.name: witch_doctor_malpractice
facets.title: Malpractice
facets.description: Enemies dying while Maledicted explode.

facets.name: riki_contract_killer
facets.title: Contract Killer
facets.description: Riki receives bonus experience for assists and kills.

facets.name: riki_exterminator
facets.title: Exterminator
facets.description: Tricks of the Trade has 4.5x Agility Bonus when attacking non-hero units. When Riki kills a non-hero unit during Tricks of the Trade, the cooldown is reduced by 0.75s.

facets.name: enigma_gravity
facets.title: Event Horizon
facets.description: Units in a 600 radius moving away from Enigma have a 8% movespeed penalty.

facets.name: enigma_fragment
facets.title: Splitting Image
facets.description: Enigma spawns Eidolons upon receiving damage.

facets.name: tinker_repair_bots
facets.title: Repair Bots
facets.description: March of the Machines applies a non-stacking heal over time when passing through allied heroes.

facets.name: tinker_translocator
facets.title: Translocator
facets.description:
When a Self-Defense Matrix barrier on Tinker is fully absorbed, he blinks in a random forward direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

facets.name: sniper_ghillie_suit
facets.title: Ghillie Suit
facets.description: While Take Aim is active, Sniper's attacks do not reveal him from fog of war.

facets.name: sniper_scattershot
facets.title: Scattershot
facets.description: Shrapnel slow and damage are increased, but duration is decreased.

facets.name: necrolyte_profane_potency
facets.title: Profane Potency
facets.description: Sadist also grants Necrophos' AoE abilities and items bonus Radius per kill.

facets.name: necrolyte_rapid_decay
facets.title: Rapid Decay
facets.description: Ghost Shroud steals speed from his enemies and decreases their restorative powers.

facets.name: warlock_golem
facets.title: Champion of Gorroth
facets.description: Chaotic Offering Golems deal more burn damage based on Warlock's health and mana regeneration.

facets.name: warlock_grimoire
facets.title: Black Grimoire
facets.description: Grants Warlock the item Black Grimoire, which can be consumed to gain experience for each kill Warlock participated in. Starts with 1 charge.

facets.name: beastmaster_wild_hunt
facets.title: Wild Hunt
facets.description: Beastmaster attacks faster when his units are nearby.

facets.name: beastmaster_beast_mode
facets.title: Beast Mode
facets.description: Beastmaster can get a self attack speed and damage amplification boost.

facets.name: queenofpain_lifesteal
facets.title: Succubus Facet
facets.description: All sources of Spell Lifesteal also apply to Pure Damage. Queen of Pain gains Spell Lifesteal that increases with proximity to her enemies. Lifesteal is at its maximum when the enemy is 150 units or closer to her and at its minimum when the enemy is 800 units or further from her.

facets.name: queenofpain_selfdmg
facets.title: Masochist
facets.description: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.

facets.name: queenofpain_facet_bondage
facets.title: Bondage
facets.description: Queen of Pain returns spell damage back to enemies. Succubus's Spell Lifesteal also applies to Pure & Magical reflected damage.

facets.name: venomancer_patient_zero
facets.title: Patient Zero
facets.description: Noxious Plague spreads again.

facets.name: venomancer_plague_carrier
facets.title: Plague Carrier
facets.description: When Venomous Gale impacts enemy heroes, 2 Plague Wards are created around them. Plague Wards also deal Septic Shock damage based on their attack damage.

facets.name: faceless_void_chronosphere
facets.title: Chronosphere
facets.description: Faceless Void can cast Chronosphere, trapping enemies in a sphere.

facets.name: faceless_void_time_zone
facets.title: Time Zone
facets.description: Faceless Void can cast Time Zone, dramatically slowing down enemies and speeding up allies in an area.

facets.name: skeleton_king_facet_bone_guard
facets.title: Bone Guard
facets.description: Wraith King can summon skeletons to fight for him.

facets.name: skeleton_king_facet_cursed_blade
facets.title: Spectral Blade
facets.description: Wraith King's attacks curse enemies, dealing additional damage after a delay.

facets.name: death_prophet_suppress
facets.title: Suppress
facets.description: Silenced enemies are also slowed.

facets.name: death_prophet_ghosts
facets.title: Spirit Collector
facets.description: Hero deaths empower your next Exorcism.

facets.name: death_prophet_delayed_damage
facets.title: Mourning Ritual
facets.description: Death Prophet delays a percentage of incoming damage, taking the damage in even intervals over a short duration.

facets.name: phantom_assassin_veiled_one
facets.title: Veiled One
facets.description: Blur is no longer dispelled when attacking and reduces mana costs during and after Blur.

facets.name: phantom_assassin_methodical
facets.title: Methodical
facets.description: Coup de Grace procs every [object Object] attacks on the same hero or [object Object] attacks on non hero units.

facets.name: phantom_assassin_sweet_release
facets.title: Sweet Release
facets.description: Stifling Dagger re-casts when an enemy dies.

facets.name: pugna_siphoning_ward
facets.title: Siphoning Ward
facets.description: Nether Ward restores mana and health to Pugna based on how much damage is dealt.

facets.name: pugna_rewards_of_ruin
facets.title: Rewards of Ruin
facets.description: Pugna receives 1.5% spell amplification per destroyed tower.

facets.name: templar_assassin_voidblades
facets.title: Voidblades
facets.description: Meld bonus damage and armor reductions are applied to all enemies in the Psi Blades split range.

facets.name: templar_assassin_refractor
facets.title: Refractor
facets.description: Refraction gains a damage charge every time a shield charge gets consumed.

facets.name: templar_assassin_hidden_reach
facets.title: Hidden Reach
facets.description: When in Meld, Templar increases her attack range by up to an additional 400 range over 1s.

facets.name: viper_poison_burst
facets.title: Poison Burst
facets.description: After Poison Attack stacks expire, enemies around the target take additional damage.

facets.name: viper_caustic_bath
facets.title: Caustic Bath
facets.description: Viper's Corrosive Skin effects are increased while he is in Nethertoxin.

facets.name: luna_moonshield
facets.title: Moonshield
facets.description: Lunar Orbit provide damage reduction while active.

facets.name: luna_moonstorm
facets.title: Moonstorm
facets.description: Hitting enemies with Lucent Beams or Eclipse grants Luna bonus attack damage.

facets.name: dragon_knight_fire_dragon
facets.title: Fire Dragon
facets.description: Dragon Knight deals additional Magic Damage with his attacks. Dragon Knight's abilities have increased Area of Effect that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form.

facets.name: dragon_knight_corrosive_dragon
facets.title: Corrosive Dragon
facets.description: Dragon Knight has Corrosive Powers on his attacks that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form. All of his abilities deal Physical damage.

facets.name: dragon_knight_frost_dragon
facets.title: Frost Dragon
facets.description: Dragon Knight has Slow and Health Restoration Reduction Effects on his attacks that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form.

facets.name: dazzle_facet_nothl_boon
facets.title: Nothl Boon
facets.description: Dazzle's overhealing is converted into a barrier. Weave is stronger on allies and amplifies incoming heals from Dazzle.

facets.name: dazzle_poison_bloom
facets.title: Poison Bloom
facets.description: Dazzle can spread his Poison Touch when attacking enemies. Weave is stronger on enemies.

facets.name: rattletrap_hookup
facets.title: Hookup
facets.description: If there's another allied hero within 350 of Hookshot's hit target, Clockwerk and all allies in the area receive bonus armor, while refunding a portion of Hookshot's cooldown and manacost.

facets.name: rattletrap_expanded_armature
facets.title: Expanded Armature
facets.description: Power Cogs form in a larger radius.

facets.name: rattletrap_junk_mail
facets.title: Chainmeal
facets.description: Clockwerk can consume Chainmails to permanently gain +4 armor.

facets.name: leshrac_attacks_mana
facets.title: Chronoptic Nourishment
facets.description: Leshrac's attacks restore mana.

facets.name: leshrac_misanthropy
facets.title: Misanthropy
facets.description: Diabolic Edict explosion rate increased but it no longer damages buildings.

facets.name: furion_soothing_saplings
facets.title: Soothing Saplings
facets.description: After Sprout is cast, all trees in a 900 radius heal nearby allies.

facets.name: furion_ironwood_treant
facets.title: Ironwood Treant
facets.description: Nature's Call creates only 1 =1 =1 =1 Treant that has more health, more damage, increased vision, increased movement speed, and is Reinforced.

facets.name: furion_natures_profit
facets.title: Nature's Profit
facets.description: Whenever Nature's Prophet kills an enemy hero or one dies nearby, a money tree is created in their place that drops gold bags to be collected.

facets.name: life_stealer_rage
facets.title: Rage
facets.description: Lifestealer can cast Rage, becoming Debuff Immune and increasing magic resistance.

facets.name: life_stealer_rage_dispell
facets.title: Unfettered
facets.description: Lifestealer can cast Unfettered to dispel himself and become more resilient. Can cast while stunned.

facets.name: life_stealer_fleshfeast
facets.title: Fleshfeast
facets.description: Feast's max HP per hero kill is increased. Open Wounds' cooldown is refreshed if a unit dies while afflicted by Open Wounds.

facets.name: life_stealer_gorestorm
facets.title: Gorestorm
facets.description: Consuming a creep with Infest drenches enemies in blood which deals damage over time based on the host's remaining health. Infest can be used on Ancient creeps.

facets.name: dark_seer_atkspd
facets.title: Quick Wit
facets.description: Dark Seer also gains Attack Speed from Intelligence.

facets.name: dark_seer_movespd
facets.title: Heart of Battle
facets.description: Dark Seer moves faster when near other heroes.

facets.name: clinkz_suppressive_fire
facets.title: Suppressive Fire
facets.description: Strafe attacks cause enemies to miss more often.

facets.name: clinkz_engulfing_step
facets.title: Engulfing Step
facets.description: Death Pact teleports Clinkz towards his victim. Reduces Death Pact cooldown.

facets.name: omniknight_omnipresent
facets.title: Omnipresent
facets.description: Omniknight deals more damage to heroes inside his Degen Aura.

facets.name: omniknight_dmgheals
facets.title: Healing Hammer
facets.description: Ability damage done to enemies by Omniknight heals him over time.

facets.name: enchantress_overprotective_wisps
facets.title: Overprotective Wisps
facets.description: Summon Healing Wisps upon receiving damage.

facets.name: enchantress_spellbound
facets.title: Spellbound
facets.description: Enchant and attacks on Enchanted targets have extra range.

facets.name: huskar_bloodbath
facets.title: Bloodbath
facets.description: Life Break also slows enemies in a radius around the target.

facets.name: huskar_nothl_transfusion
facets.title: Nothl Transfusion
facets.description: Life Break also heals friendly units in a radius around the target.

facets.name: huskar_cauterize
facets.title: Cauterize
facets.description: Berserker's Blood can be activated for a health cost. Dispels Huskar, then after a delay, heals for the amount of health consumed plus an additional bonus per debuff dispelled.

facets.name: huskar_nothl_conflagration
facets.title: Incendiary
facets.description: Burning Spears also burns enemies for a percentage of their max health. Costs Max Health instead of Current Health.

facets.name: night_stalker_blinding_void
facets.title: Blinding Void
facets.description: Enemies affected by Void do not share vision with their allies. Affected enemies take damage per second when they are not visible to their allies.

facets.name: night_stalker_dayswap
facets.title: Night Reign
facets.description: The game now starts at night instead of day. Night is longer than day. Night Stalker starts with a bonus level of Hunter in the Night.

facets.name: night_stalker_voidbringer
facets.title: Voidbringer
facets.description: Increases the max level of Void. Level 5 Void at night becomes ground targeted and applies to an area.

facets.name: broodmother_necrotic_webs
facets.title: Necrotic Webs
facets.description: Reduces health restoration of enemies on webs.

facets.name: broodmother_feeding_frenzy
facets.title: Feeding Frenzy
facets.description: Insatiable Hunger also applies to nearby Spiderlings.

facets.name: bounty_hunter_shuriken
facets.title: Through and Through
facets.description: Shuriken Toss applies its damage and slow to all enemies it passes through.

facets.name: bounty_hunter_mugging
facets.title: Cutpurse
facets.description: Bounty Hunter steals gold when targeting enemy heroes with his abilities or items.

facets.name: weaver_skitterstep
facets.title: Skitterstep
facets.description: Shukuchi movespeed increased and slows enemies when passing through them.

facets.name: weaver_hivemind
facets.title: Hivemind
facets.description: Weaver gains experience when The Swarm beetles attack heroes.

facets.name: jakiro_fire
facets.title: Liquid Fire Facet
facets.description: Jakiro can imbue his attacks with Attack Speed Slow and Damage over Time in an AoE.

facets.name: jakiro_ice
facets.title: Liquid Frost Facet
facets.description: Jakiro can imbue his attacks with Movement Speed Slow and a debuff that amplifies damage from his other spells.

facets.name: jakiro_twin_terror
facets.title: Twin Terror
facets.description: Jakiro deals more damage with his double attacks.

facets.name: jakiro_ice_breaker
facets.title: Ice Breaker
facets.description: Ice Path lasts longer and detonates upon expiration, dealing damage and stunning enemies a second time. Ice Path can be manually detonated early.

facets.name: batrider_buff_on_displacement
facets.title: Stoked
facets.description: Firefly also lights Batrider on fire. He gains increasingly more Move Speed and Spell Amplification and burns away a portion of his max health each second.

facets.name: batrider_arsonist
facets.title: Arsonist
facets.description: Increases the max level of Sticky Napalm. Level 5 Sticky Napalm causes every attack to apply 1 stack of Sticky Napalm.

facets.name: chen_centaur_convert
facets.title: Centaur Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.

facets.name: chen_wolf_convert
facets.title: Wolf Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Giant Wolf or Alpha Wolf.

facets.name: chen_hellbear_convert
facets.title: Hellbear Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.

facets.name: chen_troll_convert
facets.title: Troll Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.

facets.name: chen_satyr_convert
facets.title: Satyr Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.

facets.name: chen_frog_convert
facets.title: Marshmage Convert
facets.description: Summon Convert calls forth either a Marshmage Apprentice or a Marshmage.

facets.name: spectre_forsaken
facets.title: Forsaken
facets.description: Spectre deals 2x damage with Desolate. Spectre's illusions no longer have Desolate.

facets.name: spectre_twist_the_knife
facets.title: Twist the Knife
facets.description: Reality also casts Spectral Dagger on the Haunt illusion's target.

facets.name: doom_bringer_gluttony
facets.title: Gluttony
facets.description: Devour now has 2 charges and stolen creep abilities are upgraded by one level.

facets.name: doom_bringer_boost_selling
facets.title: Devil's Bargain
facets.description: Doom can sell items for 85% of their value, but his buyback costs are increased by 20%.

facets.name: doom_bringer_impending_doom
facets.title: Impending Doom
facets.description: Every 6.66 minutes, Doom's duration is increased by 0.66s.

facets.name: ancient_apparition_bone_chill
facets.title: Bone Chill
facets.description: Ancient Apparition's abilities reduce the enemy's Strength.

facets.name: ancient_apparition_exposure
facets.title: Exposure
facets.description: Cold Feet applies in an AoE, depending on the current level of Ice Blast.

facets.name: ursa_grudge_bearer
facets.title: Grudge Bearer
facets.description: When damaged during Enrage, Ursa gains bonus attack damage.

facets.name: ursa_debuff_reduce
facets.title: Bear Down
facets.description: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last longer.

facets.name: spirit_breaker_bull_rush
facets.title: Bull Rush
facets.description: Charge of Darkness bonus movement speed lingers after charge ends.

facets.name: spirit_breaker_imbalanced
facets.title: Imbalanced
facets.description: Enemy targets hit by Nether Strike will be moved further by allied forced movement effects.

facets.name: spirit_breaker_bulls_hit
facets.title: Bull's Hit
facets.description: Greater Bash chance is increased if you've bashed more than one hero recently.

facets.name: gyrocopter_secondary_strikes
facets.title: Secondary Strikes
facets.description: Call Down creates delayed secondary explosions around heroes it hits.

facets.name: gyrocopter_afterburner
facets.title: Afterburner
facets.description: Every successful hit of a Rocket Barrage rocket on an enemy hero increases Gyrocopter's movement speed.

facets.name: alchemist_seed_money
facets.title: Seed Money
facets.description: Alchemist starts with 250 more gold.

facets.name: alchemist_mixologist
facets.title: Mixologist
facets.description: Unstable Concoction and Berserk Potion recharge faster when in Chemical Rage.

facets.name: alchemist_dividends
facets.title: Dividends
facets.description: Alchemist gains +70 GPM for each Aghanim's Scepter he has granted to allies.

facets.name: invoker_quas_focus
facets.title: Scholar of Koryx
facets.description:
Quas gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Quas gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Ice Wall.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Ghost Walk.

facets.name: invoker_wex_focus
facets.title: Mind of Tornarus
facets.description:
Wex gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Wex gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Tornado.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades E.M.P.

facets.name: invoker_exort_focus
facets.title: Agent of Gallaron
facets.description:
Exort gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Exort gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Sun Strike.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Sun Strike.

facets.name: silencer_irrepressible
facets.title: Irrepressible
facets.description: Silencer cannot be silenced.

facets.name: silencer_reverberating_silence
facets.title: Reverberating Silence
facets.description: The first time Global Silence ends on a unit it is applied again.

facets.name: silencer_spread_the_knowledge
facets.title: Synaptic Split
facets.description: Increases the max level of Glaives of Wisdom. Level 5 Glaives of Wisdom bounce 1 time to a random target within 450 range.

facets.name: silencer_oppressive_silence
facets.title: Suffer In Silence
facets.description: Silencer takes less damage from and deals more damage to silenced targets.

facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_obsidian_decimator
facets.title: Obsidian Decimator
facets.description: When Essence Flux restores mana, it also temporarily increases maximum mana.

facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_overwhelming_devourer
facets.title: Overwhelming Devourer
facets.description: Heroes affected by Astral Imprisonment and Sanity's Eclipse heal Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.

facets.name: lycan_pack_leader
facets.title: Pack Leader
facets.description: Enemy heroes killed by Lycan or his units extend Shapeshift duration.

facets.name: lycan_spirit_wolves
facets.title: Spirit Wolves
facets.description: Summon Wolves creates invulnerable non-attacking wolves that buff Lycan's health and attack damage.

facets.name: lycan_alpha_wolves
facets.title: Alpha Wolves
facets.description: Increases the max level of Summon Wolves while lowering the max level of Howl and Feral Impulse.

facets.name: brewmaster_roll_out_the_barrel
facets.title: Roll Out the Barrel
facets.description: Throw a barrel at enemies, damaging them and applying Cinder Brew.

facets.name: brewmaster_drunken_master
facets.title: Drunken Master
facets.description: When brewed up, Brewmaster moves with a varying amount of movement speed, altering between 15% slower and 50% faster for the duration.

facets.name: shadow_demon_promulgate
facets.title: Promulgate
facets.description: Disseminate instantly removes a percentage of the opponent's health for its duration.

facets.name: shadow_demon_facet_soul_mastery
facets.title: Shadow Servant
facets.description: Shadow Demon creates illusions of heroes that die near him.

facets.name: lone_druid_bear_with_me
facets.title: Bear with Me
facets.description: Spirit Link's Shared Armor is increased and Lone Druid's attacks heal the Spirit Bear.

facets.name: lone_druid_unbearable
facets.title: Unbearable
facets.description: True Form transforms the Spirit Bear instead of Lone Druid. Increases the distance from Lone Druid at which the Spirit Bear can attack.

facets.name: lone_druid_bear_necessities
facets.title: Bear Necessities
facets.description: Lone Druid's items are more powerful and his inventory is smaller.

facets.name: chaos_knight_strong_illusions
facets.title: Phantasmagoria
facets.description: All Chaos Knight Illusions are Strong Illusions and take less damage when near him.

facets.name: chaos_knight_irrationality
facets.title: Irrationality
facets.description: Reality Rift has equal chances of applying Break, Disarm, or Silence for 50% of the base debuff duration in addition to its normal effects.

facets.name: chaos_knight_facet_fundamental_forging
facets.title: Fundamental Forging
facets.description: Chaos Knight can craft artifacts from the next tier when making a Neutral Item.

facets.name: chaos_knight_cloven_chaos
facets.title: Cloven Chaos
facets.description: Chaos Bolt splits in half upon striking its target, stunning one additional enemy and damaging another.

facets.name: meepo_more_meepo
facets.title: More Meepo
facets.description: Obtain extra Meepos sooner and get 1 extra Meepo.

facets.name: meepo_codependent
facets.title: Codependent
facets.description: Meepos increase other Meepos' attack speed and armor.

facets.name: meepo_pack_rat
facets.title: Pack Rat
facets.description: All Meepos can use the item in the neutral item slot.

facets.name: treant_primeval_power
facets.title: Primeval Power
facets.description: Treant gains +{s:attack_damage_per_level} base attack damage per hero level.

facets.name: treant_sapling
facets.title: Sapling
facets.description: Leech Seed can be ground targeted to plant a tree.

facets.name: ogre_magi_fat_chance
facets.title: Fat Chance
facets.description: Each point of Ogre Magi's Strength adds 0.06% to Ogre Magi's Multicast chance.

facets.name: ogre_magi_learning_curve
facets.title: Learning Curve
facets.description: Level requirement of all spells and talents reduced by 1. You get 0 Ability Points at level one and 3 Ability Points at level two.

facets.name: undying_rotting_mitts
facets.title: Rotting Mitts
facets.description: While transformed into a Flesh Golem, attacks spawn a zombie.

facets.name: undying_ripped
facets.title: Ripped
facets.description: Casting Soul Rip on allies increases their Strength by a percentage of Undying's Strength.

facets.name: rubick_frugal_filch
facets.title: Frugal Filch
facets.description: Stolen spells also have lower mana cost.

facets.name: rubick_arcane_accumulation
facets.title: Arcane Accumulation
facets.description: Casting a spell temporarily increases the area of effect for all subsequent spells.

facets.name: disruptor_thunderstorm
facets.title: Thunderstorm
facets.description: Thunder Strike additionally hits all enemies within Kinetic Field. Thunder Strike Slow duration is doubled.

facets.name: disruptor_line_walls
facets.title: Kinetic Fence
facets.description: Replaces Kinetic Field with the ability to create impassable walls.

facets.name: disruptor_conduit
facets.title: Transference
facets.description: Electromagnetic Repulsion can be activated manually, be cast on allies and deals damage equal to a percentage of Disruptor's current health.

facets.name: nyx_assassin_burn_mana
facets.title: Mana Burn
facets.description: Mind Flare burns a percentage of the target's max mana.

facets.name: nyx_assassin_scuttle
facets.title: Scuttle
facets.description: For the first 15s of Vendetta, Nyx Assassin is hasted and has unobstructed pathing.

facets.name: naga_siren_passive_riptide
facets.title: Rip Tide
facets.description: Every 6 attacks from Naga and her illusions, enemies around them are damaged and their Armor is reduced.

facets.name: naga_siren_active_riptide
facets.title: Deluge
facets.description: Naga Siren can create a splash around herself and her illusions, damaging enemies and capping their max movement speed.

facets.name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_solar_bind
facets.title: Solar Bind
facets.description: Grants the Solar Bind ability while active.

facets.name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_recall
facets.title: Recall
facets.description:
After a short delay, teleports the targeted friendly hero to your location. If the targeted friendly hero takes player based damage during this time, the ability is interrupted. When cast, the teleport target's movement speed is increased. Upon teleporting, the increased movement speed buff are applied to both Keeper of the Light and the teleport target, and the latter also receives a Chakra Magic.

 If alt-cast, teleports Keeper of the Light to the target Ally instead. 

 Ability Level increases with levels of Spirit Form.

facets.name: wisp_kritzkrieg
facets.title: Kritzkrieg
facets.description: Overcharge grants attack speed and spell amplification to Io and any Tethered allies.

facets.name: wisp_medigun
facets.title: Medigun
facets.description: Overcharge grants armor and magic resistance to Io and any Tethered allies.

facets.name: visage_sepulchre
facets.title: Sepulchre
facets.description: Grave Chill also affects units around the target. Visage can also recall his familiars.

facets.name: visage_faithful_followers
facets.title: Faithful Followers
facets.description: Familiars automatically move with Visage and attack his targets.

facets.name: visage_gold_assumption
facets.title: Death Toll
facets.description: Soul Assumption kills give bonus gold. Visage can also recall his familiars.

facets.name: slark_leeching_leash
facets.title: Leeching Leash
facets.description: Pounce applies stacks of Essence Shift when striking enemy heroes.

facets.name: slark_dark_reef_renegade
facets.title: Dark Reef Renegade
facets.description: Barracuda lingers after being revealed to the enemy if Slark is not nearby allied heroes. Slark's attacks reduce the target's armor while Slark is under the effects of Barracuda.

facets.name: medusa_engorged
facets.title: Engorged
facets.description: Mystic Snake grants Medusa attack damage.

facets.name: medusa_mana_pact
facets.title: Mana Pact
facets.description: Medusa can gain attack speed at the cost of mana over time.

facets.name: medusa_slow_attacks
facets.title: Venomous Volley
facets.description: Every 6 attacks, Medusa applies poison to her arrow that briefly reduces movement speed and attack speed.

facets.name: medusa_undulation
facets.title: Undulation
facets.description: Medusa's movement speed is fixed at 310 (465 during Stone Gaze). Medusa is unslowable and does not benefit from movement speed increases.

facets.name: troll_warlord_insensitive
facets.title: Insensitive
facets.description: Fervor grants armor per stack while in melee form.

facets.name: troll_warlord_bad_influence
facets.title: Bad Influence
facets.description: During Battle Trance, Troll Warlord has increased max Fervor stacks and no attack speed limit. Battle Trance grants allied heroes 50% of the attack speed bonus.

facets.name: centaur_counter_strike
facets.title: Counter-Strike
facets.description: Double Edge damage is increased when Centaur is damage by enemies.

facets.name: centaur_horsepower
facets.title: Horsepower
facets.description: Centaur Warrunner gains Movement Speed based on his Strength.

facets.name: magnataur_reverse_polarity
facets.title: Reverse Polarity
facets.description: Reverse Polarity pulls all nearby enemies in.

facets.name: magnataur_eternal_empowerment
facets.title: Eternal Empowerment
facets.description: Empower is always on Magnus. Each subsequent attack increases its power.

facets.name: magnataur_diminishing_return
facets.title: Diminishing Return
facets.description: Increases the max level of Shockwave. Level 5 Shockwave causes it to return towards Magnus's location.

facets.name: magnataur_reverse_reverse_polarity
facets.title: Reverse Reverse Polarity
facets.description: Reverse Polarity pushes enemies away all around Magnus.

facets.name: shredder_shredder
facets.title: Shredder
facets.description: Timber Chain splinters the tree into all directions around Timbersaw.

facets.name: shredder_second_chakram
facets.title: Twisted Chakram
facets.description: Launches a second independent Chakram that follows a curved path and returns to Timbersaw, damaging and slowing enemies it passes through. Enemies caught in the saw blade will move more slowly for every 5% of health missing.

facets.name: bristleback_berserk
facets.title: Berserk
facets.description: Warpath grants scaling Attack Speed instead of Damage.

facets.name: bristleback_snot_rocket
facets.title: Snot Rocket
facets.description: Bristleback now fires Viscous Nasal Goo instead of Quills when damaged. Viscous Nasal Goo effects are stronger.

facets.name: bristleback_seeing_red
facets.title: Seeing Red
facets.description: Warpath can be activated to gain extra bonuses. While Seeing Red, Bristleback's vision is limited and he does not receive vision from his allies.

facets.name: tusk_facet_tag_team
facets.title: Tag Team
facets.description: Tusk can cast Tag Team causing nearby enemies to receive bonus damage from attacks.

facets.name: tusk_facet_fist_bump
facets.title: Drinking Buddies
facets.description: Tusk can cast Drinking Buddies, pulling him and a teammate closer and granting both bonus Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

facets.name: skywrath_mage_shield
facets.title: Shield of the Scion
facets.description: Skywrath Mage gains a magic damage barrier when dealing damage to heroes.

facets.name: skywrath_mage_staff
facets.title: Staff of the Scion
facets.description: Skywrath Mage's Cooldowns are reduced when he deals spell damage to enemy heroes.

facets.name: abaddon_death_dude
facets.title: The Quickening
facets.description: Units dying nearby Abaddon lower his cooldowns.

facets.name: abaddon_mephitic_shroud
facets.title: Mephitic Shroud
facets.description: Aphotic Shield absorbs more damage and reflects damage when received instead of exploding at the end.

facets.name: abaddon_mists_of_fate
facets.title: Malignant Mist
facets.description: Mist Coil also deals 40 =60 =80 =100% attack damage and applies effects from items and abilities. Self Damage increased when targeting enemies.

facets.name: elder_titan_deconstruction
facets.title: Deconstruction
facets.description: Natural Order drains Magic Resistance and Armor over time.

facets.name: elder_titan_boost_atkspd
facets.title: Momentum
facets.description: Elder Titan's Base Attack Speed is reduced but his Movement Speed also grants Attack Speed.

facets.name: legion_commander_stonehall_plate
facets.title: Stonehall Plate
facets.description: Overwhelming Odds grants an all damage barrier based on the damage it deals to enemy heroes.

facets.name: legion_commander_spoils_of_war
facets.title: Spoils of War
facets.description: When a Duel is won, units that damaged the loser during the Duel will gain permanent bonus damage. If Legion Commander won the Duel, she will automatically cast Press the Attack on herself and assisting allies.

facets.name: ember_spirit_double_impact
facets.title: Double Impact
facets.description: Sleight of Fist hits one of its targets an extra time.

facets.name: ember_spirit_chain_gang
facets.title: Chain Gang
facets.description: Searing Chains can affect two additional enemies. When Searing Chains are cast, they are also cast around each Fire Remnant.

facets.name: earth_spirit_resonance
facets.title: Resonance
facets.description: Gain bonus Attack Damage when Magnetizing Stone Remnants.

facets.name: earth_spirit_stepping_stone
facets.title: Stepping Stone
facets.description: Stone Remnant has a {s:bonus_AbilityCooldown}s cooldown instead of Charges and Remnants don't get destroyed by Rolling Boulder.

facets.name: earth_spirit_ready_to_roll
facets.title: Ready to Roll
facets.description: Rolling Boulder can roll over allied heroes for additional bonuses.

facets.name: terrorblade_condemned
facets.title: Condemned
facets.description: There is no minimum health threshold for Sundered enemies.

facets.name: terrorblade_soul_fragment
facets.title: Soul Fragment
facets.description: Conjure Image illusions always spawn at full health and cost health instead of mana.

facets.name: phoenix_facet_immolate
facets.title: Dying Light
facets.description: Phoenix deals 4.5% of his missing health as magic damage to all enemies in a 400 radius every second.

facets.name: phoenix_hotspot
facets.title: Hotspot
facets.description: Sun Ray deals more damage and applies more Blinding Sun stacks towards the tip of the ray.

facets.name: oracle_facet_dmg
facets.title: Clairvoyant Curse
facets.description: Spell amplification increased by 1% per hero level.

facets.name: oracle_facet_heal
facets.title: Clairvoyant Cure
facets.description: Heal amplification increased by 0.75% per hero level.

facets.name: techies_atk_range
facets.title: Squee's Scope
facets.description: Techies gains 1 attack range and attack projectile speed for each point of attack speed.

facets.name: techies_spleens_secret_sauce
facets.title: Spleen's Secret Sauce
facets.description: Increased Blast Off! damage and self damage.

facets.name: techies_backpack
facets.title: Spoon's Stash
facets.description: Techies stack all previously selected Enchantments onto newly crafted Neutral Items.

facets.name: winter_wyvern_heal_mana
facets.title: Essence of the Blueheart
facets.description: Winter Wyvern's heals also restore mana.

facets.name: winter_wyvern_atk_range
facets.title: Dragon Sight
facets.description: Winter Wyvern gains bonus damage when her attack range is over 400.

facets.name: winter_wyvern_winterproof
facets.title: Winterproof
facets.description: Cold Embrace can be cast on buildings. Does not heal buildings. Allied units and buildings gain bonus attack damage when emerging from the icy cocoon.

facets.name: winter_wyvern_recursive
facets.title: Recursive
facets.description: Winter's Curse is recast on the lowest health enemy hero if the primary target dies.

facets.name: arc_warden_runed_replica
facets.title: Runed Replica
facets.description:
The Tempest Double is infused with the bonuses of Power Runes for 12s when created.

Level 1 - Arcane Rune.

Level 2 - Arcane and Invisibility Runes.

Level 3 - Arcane, Invisibility, and Haste Runes.

facets.name: arc_warden_power_capture
facets.title: Power Capture
facets.description: Magnetic Field pulls runes. Arc Warden gains +1.5 all attributes permanently upon activating a Power Rune.

facets.name: abyssal_underlord_demons_reach
facets.title: Demon's Reach
facets.description: Underlord's attacks cleave while he has bonus damage from Atrophy Aura.

facets.name: abyssal_underlord_summons
facets.title: Abyssal Horde
facets.description: Fiend's Gate periodically summons minions.

facets.name: monkey_king_wukongs_faithful
facets.title: Wukong's Faithful
facets.description: Monkey King's soldiers last longer and do not disperse unless he spends more than 4.0 seconds outside the area.

facets.name: monkey_king_simian_stride
facets.title: Simian Stride
facets.description: Increases the max level of Tree Dance. Level 5 Tree Dance reduces the cooldown to zero.

facets.name: monkey_king_transfiguration
facets.title: Changing of the Guard
facets.description: Monkey King can transform into one of his soldiers during Wukong's command.

facets.name: pangolier_double_jump
facets.title: Double Jump
facets.description: Pangolier can double jump with Shield Crash dealing more damage and gaining more barrier.

facets.name: pangolier_thunderbolt
facets.title: Thunderbolt
facets.description: Rolling Thunder movement and turn speed increased, but duration is decreased.

facets.name: dark_willow_throwing_shade
facets.title: Throwing Shade
facets.description: Dark Willow deals more damage to nearby heroes when she's in the Shadow Realm.

facets.name: dark_willow_thorny_thicket
facets.title: Thorny Thicket
facets.description: Bramble Maze creates extra brambles.

facets.name: dark_willow_shattering_crown
facets.title: Shattering Crown
facets.description: Cursed Crown accumulates all damage dealt by Dark Willow and attack damage dealt by her allies. A percentage of that damage is dealt again as magical damage to the whole area when the counter expires.

facets.name: grimstroke_inkstigate
facets.title: Inkstigate
facets.description: Ink Swell can be manually detonated early.

facets.name: grimstroke_fine_art
facets.title: Fine Art
facets.description: Stroke of Fate additionally launches a reflected curved stroke from the right hand.

facets.name: mars_victory_feast
facets.title: Victory Feast
facets.description: Mars and his allies gain health, mana, and attack damage when an enemy inside his Arena of Blood dies.

facets.name: mars_arena
facets.title: Blood Sport
facets.description: Enemies inside the Arena of Blood don't have vision outside the arena.

facets.name: void_spirit_sanctuary
facets.title: Sanctuary
facets.description: Resonant Pulse creates a larger all damage barrier instead of a physical barrier.

facets.name: void_spirit_phys_barrier
facets.title: Symmetry
facets.description: Void Spirit gains a physical damage barrier when dealing magic damage to enemy heroes.

facets.name: void_spirit_aether_artifice
facets.title: Call of the Void
facets.description: Upon exiting Dissimilate, Aether Remnants are created at the 3 portals furthest from Void Spirit.

facets.name: snapfire_ricochet_ii
facets.title: Ricochet II
facets.description: Whenever Snapfire glances or misses an attack, 2 ricochet attacks will bounce towards nearby enemies.

facets.name: snapfire_full_bore
facets.title: Full Bore
facets.description: Scatterblast is narrower and longer. Bonus damage and slow when enemies are not in point blank range.

facets.name: hoodwink_hunter
facets.title: Go Nuts
facets.description: Scurry also provides bonus attack and cast range.

facets.name: hoodwink_treebounce_trickshot
facets.title: Treebounce Trickshot
facets.description: Acorn Shot can bounce once on trees.

facets.name: hoodwink_hipshot
facets.title: Hipshot
facets.description: Sharpshooter has a greatly reduced cooldown. Damage, debuff duration, turn time, and wind-up times are also reduced.

facets.name: dawnbreaker_solar_charged
facets.title: Solar Charged
facets.description: Whenever Dawnbreaker hits a target with a powered up Luminosity, she decreases the cooldowns of all of her abilities.

facets.name: dawnbreaker_gleaming_hammer
facets.title: Gleaming Hammer
facets.description: Celestial Hammer heals allies and damages enemies when on the ground.

facets.name: dawnbreaker_blaze
facets.title: Starsurge
facets.description: Dawnbreaker and nearby allies gain bonus attack speed at the end of Starbreaker for each swipe that hit enemy heroes.

facets.name: dawnbreaker_hearthfire
facets.title: Trailblazer
facets.description: Walking along Celestial Hammer's fire trail gives bonus movespeed.

facets.name: marci_sidekick
facets.title: Sidekick
facets.description: Marci can protect an ally, granting them shared lifesteal and damage. Effect is stronger if she's close to the ally.

facets.name: marci_bodyguard
facets.title: Bodyguard Facet
facets.description: Marci can protect an ally, countering attacks directed towards them if she's in range of the enemy.

facets.name: marci_buddy_system
facets.title: Buddy System
facets.description: While bodyguarded, Marci and her partner share a portion of health healed by this ability with each other.

facets.name: marci_pickmeup
facets.title: Pick-me-up
facets.description: Rebound can be alt-cast to bring Marci's ally with her after the jump.

facets.name: marci_fleeting_fury
facets.title: Fleeting Fury
facets.description: Upon landing with Rebound, Marci gains a Fury combo.

facets.name: primal_beast_romp_n_stomp
facets.title: Romp n' Stomp
facets.description: Trample grants bonus movement speed to Primal Beast and his allies when activated.

facets.name: primal_beast_provoke_the_beast
facets.title: Provoke the Beast
facets.description: Gain 3 Uproar stacks upon being disabled by an enemy hero.

facets.name: primal_beast_ferocity
facets.title: Ferocity
facets.description: Each Pulverize slam increase Primal Beast's AoE.

facets.name: muerta_dance_of_the_dead
facets.title: Dance of the Dead
facets.description: The Calling becomes stronger when heroes die inside it.

facets.name: muerta_ofrenda
facets.title: Ofrenda
facets.description: Muerta can place a beneficial Ofrenda on the map to respawn there instead of the fountain.

facets.name: muerta_slingshot
facets.title: Quickdraw
facets.description:
Dead Shot fears increase Gunslinger chance.

Gunslinger procs reduce Dead Shot cooldown.

facets.name: ringmaster_default
facets.title: Center Stage
facets.description: Ringmaster is still new to the spotlight. This facet doesn't do anything... yet.

facets.description: Ringmaster's Souvenirs are Funhouse Mirror, Strongman Tonic, and Whoopee Cushion.

facets.description: Ringmaster's Souvenirs are Crystal Ball, Unicycle, and Weighted Pie.

facets.name: kez_flutter
facets.title: Flutter
facets.description: Kez deals extra damage on the first attack or ability after switching to Katana, and gains bonus movement speed after switching to Sai.

facets.name: kez_shadowhawk
facets.title: Shadowhawk
facets.description: Triggering a Shodo Sai Mark from invisibility deals bonus critical damage. Increases Raven's Veil invisibility duration.
